dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 293 IH: Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Alaska introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To extend the authorization of appropriations to the Department of Veterans Affairs for purposes of awarding grants to veterans service organizations for the transportation of highly rural veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of authority to make grants to Veterans Service Organizations for transportation of highly rural veterans
section.text: Section 307(d) of the Caregivers and Veterans Omnibus Health Services Act of 2010 (Public Law 111–163; 124 Stat. 1154; 38 U.S.C. 1710 note), as most recently amended by section 106 of the Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2016 (Public Law 114–228; 130 Stat. 937), is amended by striking 2017 and inserting 2018.
